column3: Gelen's house is somewhat breezier than usual.
Slay earth sprites and obtain their cores.
Deliver the earth sprite cores to Gelen.
Would you mind givin' me a hand? I've not got long left. It's the least you could do.
I've been livin' in this house ever since I got married. It was never in what I would call good nick, but it is mine. However, recently a huge crack appeared in the wall.

I'd repair it myself, but I don't have the necessary materials. Do an old woman a favor and slay three earth sprites. You'll find some by the Ziggurat. Bring back their cores and we'll see if this house can't be fixed.
Do an old woman a favor and slay three earth sprites. Bring back their cores and we'll see if this house can't be fixed.
You best not have come back without those cores.
Lovely! I'll get to work breakin' these up right away. Then I just need mix them into a paste that I can apply to the crack.
That should stop it from reappearin' for a few years yet. With any luck, I won't even be around to see it crack again!

Apparently the very ground we stand on used to be part of the quarry. Then, one day someone decided to start using it as a rest area. Eventually a house was built here─one thing led to another─and, before anyone knew it, a whole settlement had popped up.
Anyway, that's enough stories for one day. Thank you, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>lass<Else/>lad</If>.
